Pretty please based Ted, actually fix it this time.

Hiding UI is being a bit screwy, just working on a fix here..

Update: Ah, the issue here is that because hiding is bound to F2 - a sensible binding so that it does it alongside the rest of the UI - it is hidden regardless of being bound within the plugin when F2 is pressed within the flight scene. Thus, if you end up hiding it in the VAB, transition to the flight scene and then want to bring the UI back, you also end up hiding the entire UI, which then hides the plugin as well. Probably best to bind it to something other than F2 for now, then. I'm thinking that P is probable best as that's not bound to anything in-game and I'll make it rebindable in the config.

Edited December 20, 2013 by Ted

Alright, fixed and reuploaded. Please redownload and remove the old config.xml before starting up KSP as issues may persist with the UI not appearing otherwise.

What does this mod even do? I've heard that many people like it, but not much more than that, and the OP isn't exactly informative.

Think of it like a high definition screen shot plugin. KSP compresses screenshots and doesn't produce the best quality even though it may seem like it. BOSS uses a few techniques to ramp up the quality to make professional quality screenshots. Supersampling and a few other processes coincide to produce top notch shots.
